Text:
Many thanks for this wonderful contribution!

If it helps me understand my flat coated retrieved then it will be a valuable resource.

Don't wish to sound ungrateful but I think that 64kbps is more than acceptable for an audiobooks and helps to keep bandwidth use to a minimum.

Take care
Neil

A low 64kbps bit rate Audiobook is here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6267311/Alexandra_Horowitz_-_Inside_of_a_Dog_-_Nonfiction_Bestseller

Share and enjoy!
Eef.
